item.description:
We will be attending Liberty Love Fest II in Worcester and need your help to table there to reach out to the greater liberty community with the message of truth.

Spreading love for liberty through music, arts, education and industry

This event goes on for 3 days, Friday, Saturday and Sunday! Come one day or for all the days for the maximum effect.

The Osgood Bradley Building is a huge old industrial building that serves as the setting for the Liberty Clubhouse. The Love Fest is up on the top floor, so you get a great view of Worcester from up there, too.

See the Facebook group for more details about the Liberty Love Fest II.

Join us for a celebration of epic proportions! The New England Liberty LOVE Fest is a celebration and opportunity for like minded people to educate, learn, inspire, and enjoy the best of the best in art and music.

* Liberty LOVE Conceptions has no affiliation to the Ron Paul for President Campaign or any delegates. We are here to promote the pursuit of Life, Liberty, Happiness and of course: LOVE! Please stay tuned for upcoming lectures, art auctions, and more great music.

Featured Artists include:
Rebel Inc
Jordan Page
Tatiana Moroz
Heistclick
Chris Ross
Federal Crime
Leaders Led
Randy Robbins
Political Animals
Farmstand
Prince Vega
A Minor Revolution
Next to Nothing
Comatose
the Stilts
A Boy Named Sue

Featured speakers include:
Adam Kokesh(Adam vs. The Man/ DMT advocate ; )>)
Anthony Antonello Activist/Journalist/ Ron Paul Delegate)
Bruce Ray Riggs(dirtyunclesam.com and Liberty Candidate)
Carla Gericke(N.H. Free State Project)
Daniel Gordon(R.I. Rep. and author of anti-NDAA legislation)
Doug Berge (R.I. Tenth Amendment Center)
Agenda 21 with Dave Kopacz 
14th amendment with Bruce Ray Riggs and Chris Kairnes

There is a parking garage directly adjacent to the building.  There is also plenty of street parking in the surrounding area.

If you can help Merrimack Valley 9/11 Truth represent there, it would be appreciated. We'll need to take shifts manning the table. You'll need to buy tickets on the Love Fest website.
item.how_to_find_us: Exit 14 off of Route 290. Look for the building with the large Ron Paul banner and mural
item.name: Liberty Love Fest New England, Worcester, Mass.
